text: 20.10 Stt 19.24, Sng 11.6, Lep 14.10-11, 19.20, 20.8, 21.8 Pen God ensel ne okok, kɨli Satan ne binɨb man okok nɨb yepɨs gup anɨb anop, dam mab mɨŋɨlaŋ salpa sek yɨneb mɨgan ak dɨyokɨnɨgabal. Tap ladek ak ayɨp, bɨne nop gos ñek binɨb okok kɨlop yepɨs yɨbɨl agñak ak ayɨp, ned mɨgan anɨb ayaŋ am yelek ak nɨm, jɨmñɨl gɨl kɨli omɨŋal nokom subnab maynab ayaŋ pel pelnep yul dɨnep yenɨgabal.
